samples.question: Do you think it is a good choice to travel by plane?
samples.transcript: >> personally speaking, I would say that it is a good choice, going on a plane because it saves our time instead of traveling on a car or a or other public transports.
samples.transcript_original: >> Um, personally speaking, uh, I would say that it's a good choice, um, going on a plane because it saves our time instead of traveling on a car or a or other public transports.
samples.transcript_cleaned: >> personally speaking, I would say that it is a good choice, going on a plane because it saves our time instead of traveling on a car or a or other public transports.

samples.question: >> Why you consider it is good?
samples.transcript: As I mentioned earlier it sa it really saves most of our time which is included in the traveling and I would say plane is the best option right now which we can offer because it offers more comfort than traveling on a public transport. >> Okay.
samples.transcript_original: uh as I mentioned earlier um it sa it really saves uh most of our time uh which is included in the traveling and uh um um I would say plane is the best option right now which we can offer because it uh offers more comfort than traveling on a public transport. >> Okay.

samples.question: Some other reasons can you tell me reason for the travel?
samples.transcript: >> Yeah, traveling by plane only. >> Okay. traveling by plane I would say I have already mentioned about the travel time which it saves but I would say that it also gives us more comfort and it is a luxurious >> experience which we can have if we are traveling through business class which is not offered in the other in the other public transport options including our personal vehicle as well. >> Okay.

samples.question: What are the differences between group traveling and traveling alone?
samples.transcript: So I would say there are many differences which I would like to talk about right now. so the first difference will be the peace of mind because personally speaking I would prefer going solo because when whenever we are traveling in the group we have to take the advice for from each and every person >> and not every person is same and not every person's interest on traveling similar yes it is not similar. M >> so traveling solo is if I am traveling solo I would say I would spend most of the time without even thinking that >> can you tell me something general not personal okay so generally I have seen people traveling solo because in their cases they they do not have time to just think about anything they can go any at any random restaurant which they like >> and if they are traveling in a group they have to take advice and they have to consider everyone for traveling and even the the food choices of the people are different. >> So I have seen many people not vibing along u when they are traveling just because their interests are not similar. >> Okay. Okay.

samples.question: What do we need to prepare for a long journey?
samples.transcript: For a long journey. I have seen people preparing a week in advance. Not even a week. I have seen people planning a month in advance so that they make sure that they do not forget anything. It includes shopping and getting appropriate outfits for the trip and also making it where they have to travel and see the places and they have to also research what kind of u what kind of transports and vehicles are used over there so that they can plan and book their accommodation and the rentals accordingly. >> Okay.
samples.transcript_original: for a long journey. I've seen people uh preparing a week in advance. Not even a week. I've seen people uh planning a month in advance so that they make sure that they don't forget anything. It includes um um shopping uh and getting appropriate outfits for the trip and also um making it where they have to travel and see the places and they have to also research what kind of u what kind of transports and uh vehicles are used over there so that they can plan and book their accommodation and the rentals accordingly. >> Okay.

I have seen people planning a month in advance so that they make sure that they do not forget anything. samples.question: Nan why do some people like making long journeys?

samples.question: However, she was doing some random matters in that too.
samples.transcript: First of all this is very important. You must have strong opinion.
samples.transcript_original: First of all this is very important. You must have strong opinion.
samples.transcript_cleaned: First of all this is very important. You must have strong opinion.

samples.question: When I asked her the first question, do you think it is good choice to travel by plane?
samples.transcript: Then firstly she gave me just one idea about the time. So she could talk more about various other reasons that why this is good choice to be travel by plane. But whether like later on I was asking why how then she was explaining one by one by one those idea comfort luxury and one more idea she had given. But when examiner is asking these type of questions to you guys then this is important try to break into different reasons like first of all secondly thirdly last but not least but here she missed that she was answering me after when I was exaggerating her when I was per when I was just persuading her or convincing her give give me more ideas only then she was giving me those ideas and then in Some other questions she had done some mistakes but otherwise in the follow-up this is really very important give the strong opinion somewhere she was quite strong and somewhere she was unable to give the right opinion and she was giving some personal examples also in the opinion part. Try to use some general examples. Even if you have some personal or some private experiences, just make it general. Generalize it rather than personalizing it in the opinion part especially. Thank you so much. Hope this will be helpful.

samples.question: [Transcript chunk 1]

samples.question: [Transcript chunk 5]
samples.transcript: Was very difficult to start your day so early at 4: or 5: in the morning but with some days I actually got comfortable with that habit and now I am very comfortable waking up early doing that jog and in the evening walking for an hour with my aunt gossiping about all the things that I have done from the morning so that is the best thing and that healthy smoothies they are a like heaven they are something that I have been into for last 2 or 3 years that a blueberry smoothies my favorite even though my father is one that does not like it even the color but I love it so in all all this is my routine that I have pursued and I love it because this is something that makes me physically and mentally both strong and very calm I have actually reduced my anger issues very much after following this routine okay thank you so much this is end of the Q card so you like this routine yes ma'am especially walking and jogging yes ma'am okay now there would be some followup questions and it will be based on your Q card should children have learning routines or they should build the learning routines I think kids should have a learning routine because when you have a particular routine you are prepared about what you have to do and there is no stress that can be caused due to unex unexpected things and kids are actually very sensitive about unpredicted things so if they know in before like what is their day structured accordingly and they are in habit of that structure it will be good for them okay what are the advantages of children having a routine at school I.

samples.question: [Transcript chunk 6]
samples.transcript: Think there are numerous merits of having a routine at the school because the children will be known what is coming up next or they will have a proper learning schedule with them and they will learn accordingly their mind will also work accordingly and they will be able to absorb the information and they will be able to work accordingly so that is a very good thing if they have a proper learning schedule that is great okay how do people's routine differ on week days and on weekends there are some individuals who generally prefer having the same schedule be it a week days or weekends because they think that it get Disturbed due to weekends but there mostly individuals who have a very fixed routine from Monday to Friday that is the weekday they have their deadlines their task all structured and things but on weekends they plan vacations with their family they have a cheat day they eat unhealthy so they all are the things that differs from from week days to weekends okay what are the differences in people's daily routine now and say 15 years ago I think there is a huge difference between the daily routine now and 15 years back because people had very slow mornings then they did not have any technology so they were very very calm and very composed but now since the technology has come people generally spend time on mobile phones they sleep late and they wake up late have very rushy mornings where they rush to their school or college without having breakfast even so that is very unhealthy I think now but it was very good and very nutritious we can say the routine was which was very linked to their Health back then.
